results.statement: The EG.5 variant of Covid-19 is a new 5G virus.
results.truth_rating: this is not true. covid-19 is caused by the sars-cov-2 virus. the 5g network uses radio waves that do not harm people’s health.
results.snippet: The EG.5 variant of Covid-19 is a new 5G virus.

results.statement: Bill Gates created the new coronavirus and a vaccine for it.
results.truth_rating: this is incorrect. the bill gates and melinda gates foundation has funded a research institute that has a patent to a different coronavirus.  coronavirus is a large category of viruses that includes the common cold, sars and the new virus that causes covid-19.
results.snippet: Bill Gates created the new coronavirus and a vaccine for it.

results.statement: China was the first place to have over 100,000 5G towers.
results.truth_rating: while it is true that china has over 100,000 towers, it is unclear if it was the first place to pass this number.
results.snippet: China was the first place to have over 100,000 5G towers.

results.statement: The new coronavirus is actually the impact of 5G exposure.
results.truth_rating: this is incorrect, the new coronavirus is a virus and there is no evidence that 5g is harmful to people’s health.
results.snippet: The new coronavirus is actually the impact of 5G exposure.

results.statement: Symptoms of Covid-19 include nausea, hair loss, bone marrow damage.
results.truth_rating: this is incorrect. symptoms have been reported as including fever, coughing and shortness of breath.
results.snippet: Symptoms of Covid-19 include nausea, hair loss, bone marrow damage.

results.truth_rating: there is no evidence that 5g can harm people.

results.statement: A video shows people in China tearing down a 5G tower in an attempt to stop the spread of COVID-19 coronavirus disease.
results.snippet: A video shows people in China tearing down a 5G tower in an attempt to stop the spread of COVID-19 coronavirus disease.

results.statement: A video shows a piece of 5G equipment with "COV-19" inscribed on it.
results.snippet: A video shows a piece of 5G equipment with "COV-19" inscribed on it.
